org.goldenorb
Class OrbJob

java.lang.Object
  org.goldenorb.OrbJob
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<OrbJob>, OrbConfigurable
public class OrbJob
extends Object
implements OrbConfigurable, Comparable<OrbJob>

OrbJob encompasses the pieces necessary for JobManager to start/watch/complete/kill jobs
